transcript: The time is it. They're supposed to start running around midnight. This is great, isn't it? Look at this great night we've got here. Couldn't be better.

segments.text: The time is it. They're supposed to start running around midnight.
This is great, isn't it? Look at this great night we've got here. Couldn't be better.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What time is it?  Isn't it supposed to start running around midnight?  This is great, isn't it?  Look at this great night we got here.  Couldn't be better--
